description.raw:
Currently the comparison between nightlies with the same timestamp falls into the random factor of VCS revision hash. Not trivial to generate a new nightly with the same timestamp that always superseed the previous one.

With this change we introduce `RELEASE_VERSION` not only for changes in packaging metadata but also to be relevant in the version comparison that changes from: `${UPSTREAM_VERSION}+${TIMESTAMP}r${REV}{UPSTREAM_VERSION}+${TIMESTAMP}+${RELEASE_VERSION}r${REV}`

This way bumping the `RELEASE_VERSION` always generate a greater package than previous even if the `REV` hash is alphabetically lower.

Tested here: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-cmake2-debbuilder/71/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-cmake2-debbuilder/71/)
